title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When attempting to use the JavaScript function new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in the table filter, an error message is displayed.
OB: When using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter, an error message is displayed.
EB: When using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter and previewing the report, the filter should work without any errors.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table element into the report.
3. Add a filter to the table based on the datetime column.
4. In the filter's value1 field, enter the expression new Date("..."). For example: new Date("3/2/2005").
5. Save the report and preview it.
